version_description: Bug Fixes & Performance Enhancements
Bug Fixes & Performance Enhancements
-- Competition Page UI Freeze issue Fixed.
-- Competition Upload Tap Crash Fix

- High resolution video save issue fixed.
- Video save time for repeat mode videos reduced.
- Bug Fixes and Performance enhancement.

iOS 12 Bug fixes and Various performance enhancements.

Bug fixes & Performance enhancements

NEW:
Undo, Redo option added to Ripple: Motion & Stabilise.
Different Loop modes to choose from for your Ripple.
Option added to to apply Filters on your Ripple.

Social enhancements:
Like your favourite posts.
See number of views of all the StoryZ.
Option to follow creators added.
Personalised profile page for each creator- check your own and others’ posts, likes, followers and views.
Bug fixes & Performance enhancements

New Overlay feature : Make your still images dynamic by adding from range of overlay effects.
Grow your community : Find new people and trending hashtags
Overlay store: Access to unlimited number of overlay videos and effects.
Various performance enhancements and UI improvements.
Bug fixes and Various performance enhancements.

Now user can add text and cutouts as overlays.
Notification center: Users will get notified when someone starts following or likes their posts.
Various performance enhancements and UI improvements.
